bropals.lib.simplegame.applet

Class GameApplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • javax.swing.JApplet
              • bropals.lib.simplegame.applet.GameApplet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameWindow, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestApplet

    public abstract class GameApplet
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements GameWindow
    Used for when making Applets with BroPalsGameLibrary. Should be extended and override the loadResources, getInitialState() and getAppletSettings() methods.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setScreenResolution

        public boolean setScreenResolution(ScreenResolution screenResolution)
        Description copied from interface: GameWindow
        Sets the screen resolution of the AWTGameWindow. Call applyGraphicsConfiguration() to update the fullscreen state. If the screen resolution is not supported, this method returns false.
        Specified by:
        setScreenResolution in interface GameWindow
        Parameters:
        screenResolution - the new screen resolution.
        Returns:
        if the screen change was successful.

      • loadResources

        public abstract void loadResources(AssetManager assetManager)
        Download the resources needed for this Applet game by using the URL AssetLoader given.

        The asset manager's root directory is the directory of the Applet. Use the normal load functions unless it is a more specific resource, then use the URL load functions.

        Parameters:
        assetManager - the asset manager to load resources with
